output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(dslabs)
data(murders)
```

## Empty plot

```{r}
ggplot(data = murders)
```


## Cheat sheet


```{r}
ggplot(data = murders) +
  geom_point(aes(population/10^6, total))
```


```{r}
p <- ggplot(data = murders)
```


```{r}
p + 
  geom_point(aes(population/10^6, total)) +
  geom_text(aes(population/10^6, total, label = abb))
```
